Previous git_clone calls targeting '/downloads/...' returned invalid pathâ€”maybe git_clone expects existing parent directory and will clone into provided path; but the earlier errors said invalid target path; perhaps git_clone requires the parent to exist. '/downloads' exists. Maybe it rejects subdirectory paths that don't yet exist. Alternative: clone into '/downloads' without specifying subdirectory; git_clone's parameter local_dir_path default is '/', but it supports setting to '/downloads' to clone into downloads/<repo>. Try cloning bobolive/json_xml_parsing with local_dir_path='/downloads' (it will create subdir). Then clone emmajohnson/new_project similarly.
